hooks.command: file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$(basename "$file")" == .env* ]] && [[ "$(basename "$file")" != *.example ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot edit .env files. Use .env.example instead.' >&2; exit 1; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.py ]] && [[ "$file" == */backend/* ]]; then cd /Users/mehdisaedi/instructly/backend && ./venv/bin/ruff check --fix --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null && ./venv/bin/ruff format --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.ts || "$file" == *.tsx ]] && [[ "$file" == */frontend/* ]]; then cd /Users/mehdisaedi/instructly/frontend && npx prettier --write --log-level silent "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi
